annotations.description: In this episode of How to Drink, I am making a cocktail presented by Luxardo called the Amaretto Sour. This version of the Amaretto Sour is a slightly modifi...
annotations.title: Amaretto Sour | How to Drink

textContent:
1.5oz Amaretto
.75oz Bourbon
1oz Lemon juice
.5 Simple syrup or .25 Rich simple syrup
1 Egg white

Dry shake vigorously
Garnish with maraschino cherry

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LJkdoA-qSgE&t=142s
title: Amaretto Sour
